# How to use this guide {.unnumbered}

The **EUI Research Data Guide** is intended as a reference resource (i.e. not intended to be read linearly, beginnig to the end) but all chapters link to one another to provide a comprehensive perspective on the data services and support provided by the EUI.

Here some tips for you make the best out of this guide.

## What to expect in each chapter

Each chapter of the guide strive to include:

- **Practical guidance** on the specific topic with examples
- Direct linking to **available EUI resources, tools, and support**
- elected **open resources** to support additional and more in-depth self-paced training
